articles.description: EU energy ministers approved a draft European law meant to lower demand for gas by 15 per cent from August through March.
articles.content:

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Europe struggles to end reliance on Russian gas as Putin weaponizes export - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia has cut off or reduced gas to a dozen EU countries so far. On Monday, it said it will slash flows this week through a major pipeline to Germany by another half, to 20% of capacity. | World News
